page.title: 03New Homes in Verwood,Dorset.
page.content: Most of the new residential estates in the Verwood,Eblake and Three Legged Cross areas consist of a mixture of bungalows,flats and family houses.(Older estates specialise in one type of dwelling only).Prices range from about Â£19000 to well over Â£60000. Â£19000 would buy a Studio Flat with one main room(with folding bed),a kitchenette and shower room.Six to twelve such flats being built in a block. Â£35000 would buy a 3-bedroomed terraced family house with a lounge- dining room,bathroom,garage and small garden. A 4-bedroomed detached family house with separate sitting and dining rooms kitchen/breakfast-room,bathroom,shower room and double garage in a large garden would cost over Â£60000.
